column4: so, is it normal behaviour for OO.o writer to crash when I click on "tools, macro, run macro..." on a default dapper load?
No, file a bug at launchpad http://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bugs . Take a look for a duplicate first ...
If you end up filing a bug, please get a backtrace following http://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingProgramCrash :) It's really neccessary...
